# Working with Brazilian Economic Data

Learn to access and analyze data from Brazil's major statistical and economic institutions.

## Data Sources Covered

- IBGE (Census and surveys)
- Banco Central (BCB)
- IPEA databases
- FINBRA municipal data
- Geographic data with geobr
